com.sap.vocabularies.Search.v1.@Core.Description#Published: 2018-01-31 Â© Copyright 2018 SAP SE. All rights reserved

searchable.@Core.Description: Defines if a CDS view or entity is generally relevant for search scenarios.
searchable.@Core.LongDescription: The annotation offers a general switch and a means to quickly detect whether a view is relevant or not. Set to true to enable @Search annotations. At least one column has to be defined as defaultSearchElement.

defaultSearchElement.@Core.Description: Defines a column as full-text search column.
defaultSearchElement.@Core.LongDescription: At least one column has to be defined as default full-text search column. Search in views without default full-text search elements is not supported.

ranking.@Core.Description: Defines the ranking weight for a column

fuzinessThreshold.@Core.Description: Defines the threshold for a fuzzy search.
fuzinessThreshold.@Core.LongDescription: Default value is 1. This means that an exact search is performed.

termMappingDictionary.@Core.Description: Defines the name of the term mapping table.
termMappingDictionary.@Core.LongDescription: Defines the name of the term mapping table (format: schemaname.tablename). passed to the search option 'termMappingTable' of the CONTAINS() predicate.

termMappingListID.@Core.Description: Defines the names of the term mapping list IDs.
termMappingListID.@Core.LongDescription: Defines the names of the term mapping list IDs, passed to the search option 'termMappingListId' of the CONTAINS() predicate.

fulltextIndex.@Core.Description: If set to true, a configuration fails if there is no full-text index defined for the element.
